user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the usecase

epics.title: Project Kickoff and Requirement Definition
epics.summary: Define project objectives and set up foundational structure
epics.description: Set up the initial project environment, document business goals, and identify key deliverables. Conduct stakeholder meetings to refine scope and success criteria, ensuring clarity across all teams involved in execution.

epics.title: User Authentication and Profile Management
epics.summary: Implement a secure and efficient user management system
epics.description: Design and implement secure authentication mechanisms including registration, login, and profile management. Enforce session handling, password encryption, and role-based authentication to maintain user security and accessibility.

epics.title: Core Feature Development
epics.summary: Build essential features supporting primary use case
epics.description: Develop the core features that directly fulfill the systemâ€™s purpose. Define workflows, system logic, and backend services to deliver business value efficiently. Ensure modular and scalable architecture for future expansion.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience Design
epics.summary: Create an engaging and consistent UI for all modules
epics.description: Design and implement responsive, user-friendly interfaces that align with branding and enhance user experience. Focus on usability, accessibility, and intuitive navigation to improve overall satisfaction and engagement.

epics.title: Integrations and Advanced Capabilities
epics.summary: Add external integrations and extended functionalities
epics.description: Expand system capabilities by integrating third-party APIs and advanced features such as notifications, analytics, or payment processing. Ensure secure data exchange and documented configuration for long-term maintainability.

epics.title: System Testing and Quality Validation
epics.summary: Test, validate, and optimize system performance
epics.description: Implement comprehensive testing including unit, integration, and load tests. Validate that all functionalities meet acceptance criteria, resolve identified issues, and optimize performance before proceeding to release.

epics.title: Deployment and Production Release
epics.summary: Deploy the finished product to its target environment
epics.description: Prepare deployment pipeline, configure production servers, and execute rollout procedures. Verify successful deployment through monitoring and pre-launch validation, ensuring system stability in the production environment.

epics.title: Maintenance, Monitoring, and Continuous Improvement
epics.summary: Monitor live operation and deliver post-launch enhancements
epics.description: Provide continuous monitoring for performance, security, and reliability. Address user feedback, implement updates, fix post-release issues, and introduce incremental improvements that align with business objectives.

user_stories.title: Establish Project Foundation
user_stories.description: As a Project Manager, I want to set up development environments and define key objectives, so that the project can start on a solid foundation.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Key objectives and scope must be clearly defined and approved by stakeholders.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Development environments are set up, objectives are documented and approved, project scope is confirmed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the project is initiated, When the development environments are ready and objectives are defined, Then the project scope is confirmed with stakeholders.

user_stories.title: Gather Business Requirements
user_stories.description: As a Business Analyst, I want to gather and document business requirements, so that we can ensure the project aligns with business goals.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Requirements must be gathered from all key stakeholders and documented clearly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: All business requirements are gathered, documented and approved by stakeholders.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the requirements gathering phase, When all stakeholders provide their input, Then the business requirements are documented and approved.

user_stories.title: Implement User Registration
user_stories.description: As a User, I want to register on the platform, so that I can create an account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Registration process must be secure and user-friendly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can register successfully with required information.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the registration page, When a user fills in the required information and submits, Then the user account is created.

user_stories.title: Implement User Login
user_stories.description: As a User, I want to log into the platform, so that I can access my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Login process must be secure and reliable.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can log in successfully with their credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the login page, When a user provides valid credentials, Then the user is logged in.

user_stories.title: Implement Password Recovery
user_stories.description: As a User, I want to recover my password, so that I can regain access to my account if I forget my password.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Password recovery process must be secure and straightforward.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can recover their password using the recovery process.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the password recovery page, When a user provides the necessary information, Then the user can reset their password.

user_stories.title: Develop Backend Logic
user_stories.description: As a Developer, I want to create the backend logic, so that the core features of the application function correctly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Backend logic must align with the business use case and be reliable.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Backend logic supports the operational workflows.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the backend environment, When the logic is implemented, Then it supports the application's core features.

user_stories.title: Set Up Database Structures
user_stories.description: As a Database Administrator, I want to set up database structures, so that the application data is stored and managed efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Database structures must be optimized and secure.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Database structures support efficient data management required by the application.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the database setup phase, When the structures are implemented, Then they handle the application data effectively.

user_stories.title: Design User Interfaces
user_stories.description: As a UI/UX Designer, I want to design intuitive user interfaces, so that users find the application easy to use.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Interfaces must be consistent with the brand and usability goals.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User interfaces are intuitive and align with design goals.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the design stage, When the user interfaces are created, Then they provide a consistent and intuitive experience.

user_stories.title: Implement Responsive Design
user_stories.description: As a User, I want the application to be responsive, so that it works well on various devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Interfaces must adapt to different screen sizes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Application interfaces are responsive across devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, When accessing the application, Then the interface adjusts accordingly.

user_stories.title: Integrate Payment Gateway
user_stories.description: As an Administrator, I want to integrate a payment gateway, so that users can make secure transactions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration must be secure and support various payment methods.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Payment gateway integration supports secure transactions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a payment scenario, When a user makes a transaction, Then it is processed securely through the payment gateway.

user_stories.title: Integrate Analytics Service
user_stories.description: As a Product Manager, I want to integrate an analytics service, so that we can track user behavior and application performance.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Analytics service integration provides necessary data insights.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the analytics requirements, When the service is integrated, Then it tracks user behavior and performance effectively.

user_stories.title: Conduct Unit Testing
user_stories.description: As a QA Engineer, I want to conduct unit testing, so that each component works correctly in isolation.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tests must cover all critical components.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the testing framework, When unit tests are executed, Then critical components pass the tests.

user_stories.title: Conduct Integration Testing
user_stories.description: As a QA Engineer, I want to conduct integration testing, so that components work correctly together.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tests must validate interactions between components.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the testing framework, When integration tests are executed, Then interacting components pass the tests.

user_stories.title: Set Up Production Environments
user_stories.description: As a DevOps Engineer, I want to set up production environments, so that the application can be deployed safely and reliably.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Environment setup must be secure and scalable.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Production environments are set up and ready for deployment.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the production setup phase, When environments are configured, Then they support safe and reliable deployments.

user_stories.title: Configure Deployment Automation
user_stories.description: As a DevOps Engineer, I want to configure deployment automation, so that the application can be deployed efficiently with minimal downtime.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Deployment automation processes must include rollback plans.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Deployment automation is set up with rollback plans.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the deployment automation setup, When the application is deployed, Then it completes efficiently with minimal downtime.

user_stories.title: Monitor System Performance
user_stories.description: As a System Administrator, I want to monitor system performance, so that any issues can be identified and addressed promptly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Monitoring must include performance metrics and alert mechanisms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System performance is monitored and alerts are set for key metrics.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the monitoring setup, When performance issues occur, Then alerts are triggered.

user_stories.title: Implement Feature Enhancements
user_stories.description: As a Product Manager, I want to implement feature enhancements, so that the application continually meets user needs and expectations.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Enhancements must be driven by user feedback and analytics.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: New features and improvements are implemented based on feedback.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the continuous improvement phase, When user feedback is analyzed, Then enhancements are implemented accordingly.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture is designed to create a secure banking website using Azure infrastructure, ensuring high availability, scalability, and security.
